Sentencas: The stress state and cell degradation have been modelled considering the classical solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) materials (Ni-YSZ//YSZ//LSM).
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: The anode-supported cell is found to be un-cracked after its elaboration.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: However, the high level of energy stored in the thin electrolyte layer lowers the cell robustness as it constitutes the driving force for interfacial delamination.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: The elaboration of the electrolyte supported cell leads to the anode layer cracking.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: The heating up to 800 degrees C and the cermet reduction allow relaxing the stress level in the cell.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: For the anode-supported cell, the cermet re-oxidation induces cathode damage as soon as the anodic strain exceeds 0.05-0.09% whereas the electrolyte fracture occurs for strain ranging between 0.12% and 0.15%.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: For the electrolyte supported cell, the cermet re-oxidation induces a triggered risk of anode/electrolyte delamination when the anodic strain is higher than 0.3-0.35%.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: The risk of rupture initiation in cell singularities has been also investigated.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: A pure material electrode/electrolyte Singularity is harmless.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration

Sentencas: A perpendicular corner at the electrode/electrolyte free edge constitutes a harmful singularity.
Titulo: A numerical tool to estimate SOFC mechanical degradation: Case of the planar cell configuration
